page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: The major land use is {FARMING.}Most of the farms are owned individually/ privately, but Risquehouse, NJ529336, is owned by a farmer who owns other farms outside the area,and Mains of Gartly NJ535336 is part of a farm company.The'private' farms are: Back- burn,Westseat,Whitelumbs, Culdrain and the Cults Glen crofts-Braeside,Mains, and Blairwick. The sizes range from 45 to 300 acres. All the farms are'mixed' with the land used for arable,beef- cattle rearing-about 600 head,sheep- farming,1200 head and pig rearing at one farm with 5000 head. The arable land produces silage,barley hay,oilseed rape,potatoes and turnips. (Note-none grows oats). All but one farm works by rotation of crops-4,6,7 and 9 yearly.About half of the farmers have salaried jobs also. The soil is a mixture of slate,clay and good loam.
